sentences.en: A French aeronaut, M. Meunier , tried to attain his end by compressing air in an interior receptacle.
sentences.cn: 法国航空家摩尼叶曾经想把空气压送到气球里来达到这个目的.

sentences.en: A liquid filters through a strainer, into the receptacle beneath.
sentences.cn: 液体经过过滤器流入下面的容器.

sentences.en: A receptacle to hold the relics of saints; a reliquary.
sentences.cn: 神龛存放圣骨的容器; 圣骨盒.

sentences.en: Before operating an instrument, make sure line cord is connected to a prop - erly grounded power receptacle.
sentences.cn: 在操作仪器之前, 请确保电源线被连接到具有适当接地的电源插座.

sentences.en: Chaozhou Xingguang Porcelain Art Factory is professional in producing craft flowerpot and receptacle.
sentences.cn: 潮州市星光瓷艺厂是一家专业生产工艺花盆、花插的工厂.

sentences.en: Minute male and female flowers borne on the inner surface of a hollow receptacle; the fig.
sentences.cn: 具细小雄性或雌性的花,生长在空心的 花托 (即无花果)内侧.

sentences.en: Minute male and female flowers borne on the inner wall of the receptacle, the fig.
sentences.cn: 具细小雄性或雌性的花,生长在胀大了的花托(即无花果)内侧.

sentences.en: Only the styles are left sticking up from the receptacle and ovary.
sentences.cn: 在花托和子房上面只剩下花柱.

sentences.en: Please put your cigarette ends into the receptacle provided.
sentences.cn: 请将烟蒂放入提供的盛器里.

sentences.en: Plug the lamp cord plug back into the electrical receptacle.
sentences.cn: 把电灯线塞入调光器罩底部.

sentences.en: Power plug has to be connected to a grounded receptacle.
sentences.cn: 电源插头必须连接到接地插座上.

sentences.en: The seas have been used as a receptacle for a range of industrial toxins.
sentences.cn: 海洋成了各种有毒工业废料的大容器。

sentences.en: This receptacle accepts an IEC - type as shipped with the unit . Plug thethe unit and mains power.
sentences.cn: 该插座接受IEC类型插头, 将插头插入插座或主电源插座.

sentences.en: This sampling system is composed a sampler and sample collection receptacle.
sentences.cn: 采样系统由取样器、收集器和样品管道组成.

sentences.en: Wipe down the walls behind baths, under the soap receptacle and inside shower cubicles.
sentences.cn: 擦洗浴缸后面 、 皂盒下方以及淋浴房内的墙壁.

trans.tran_en: a container for putting things in
